scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix server/react-server && npm install --prefix client/react-app
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client/react-app && npm run build --prefix server/react-server
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix client/react-app && npm start --prefix server/react-server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server/react-server" "npm run dev --prefix client/react-app"
